item.title: FT Most Read: Friday, June 28, 2024 at 6:20 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Democrats panic as Biden stumbles in bad-tempered debate with Trump
2. French far-right leader Jordan Bardella vows ‘cultural battle’ and demands EU rebate
3. US in talks to send Israel’s Patriot systems to Ukraine
4. [Opinion] Macron’s presidency — a tragedy in four acts
5. US Supreme Court rejects plan to shield Sacklers in Purdue bankruptcy
